channel.title: How do u make ur server run?
channel.description: after i get done downloading my server and extract it with winwar and run it it runs up smoothly but it says errror connecting to the server or what ever,its when ur on the log in page and u puct ur username and password then hit enter thats when the problem comes up any one help me with my little problem.. and i have window 7 if that helps?

item.title: How do u make ur server run?
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

god people expect us to spoon feed them…

go to client.java
Ctrl +f

find “ip.” just ip. not the brackets cause i kno ull type ythe brackets…

find the ip
if it’s set as
0.0.0.0 Or 127.0.0.1 thats localhost = meaning only ucan login on ur computer no 1 else

if youwant players on…

you portforward with either your router or utorrent i prefer utorrent…

then u get no-ip

example u create host

say…

yourserver.no-ip.info

put that into it well ovi not that but the 1’ u’ve made

then compile it all and loi and u shud have an online server if u kno kinda what to do

the go to www.canyouseeme.org after portforwaridng type in 43594 to see if you’v portforwarded crrectly have fun

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make ur server run?

item.title: How do u make ur server run?
item.dc:creator: @str_pk3 str pk3
item.description:
@str_pk3 wrote:

windows 7 ultimate doesn’t have anything to do with it did u download jdk from oracle be sure to put windows 64bit cuz u got that kind right? and yes im also weirdly 12 years old(also born in 1998) and i also train in modeling!-.- nvm

item.title: How do u make ur server run?
item.dc:creator: @Andy89898 Andy89898
item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

hey I am 12 (born in 1998) quite experienced with servers now , Have you changed the ip which your client connects to? Do you have a client and a server running? you need to make sure your server is running first.
Also could you tell me what type of server/client you are using like 317… You cant mix a 317 and a 508.
